project.name: OW2 Chameleon - CXF Minimal Bundle
project.description: Bundle wrapping the CXF minimal bundle. This bundle is the same that the cxf one except for the cxf-busextension.xml which defers from the original file. In this bundle the extension for woodstox and jax-rs are not defined.
